Living Legends

Notable Characters

From the god-like Arashi to the common heroes found in the streets of Fodon‚Äîevery soul leaves a mark upon this world.

Character Rank #7

Azaraith

Darkmane Elf

Power Rank #7. The First of the Fallen ‚Äî the original Darkmane Elf who made contact with the void that corrupted the Darkmane rune practice. Has lived with corrupted runes longer than any other.

View Profile
Character Rank #2

Crimson Knight

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #2. Folkwynd human. Leader of the Crimson Rooks. Governs Vacron from shadow. Has met Fluffy and survived. The most politically powerful individual in surface Criozevan.

View Profile
Character Rank #0

Fluffy

Unknown

The most powerful entity in Criozevan. Power Rank #0. A Meta ‚Äî the only category above the five power classes. Nothing confirmed about appearance, motivation, or current location.

View Profile
Character Rank #4

Golem King

Golem

Power Rank #4. Creator of the Golem race. Ruler of the Nikolem Kingdom. The oldest confirmed living entity in Criozevan. His Realm Expansion converts a battlefield to pure stone terrain.

View Profile
Character Rank #7

King Aldric

Goldhelm

Power Rank #7. Goldhelm monarch. Rules from Ovodon's Gilded Cradle. Enforces absolute magic ban and isolationist foreign policy. Extended the Auric Vanguard's reach after the Golden War.

View Profile
Character Rank #8

Princess Seraphina

Goldhelm

Power Rank #8. Goldhelm heir. Daughter of King Aldric. Privately questions the Kingdom's isolationist policy. The most likely agent of change if the Goldhelm Kingdom ever opens its borders.

View Profile
Character Rank #6

Queen Nayele

Ipadora

Power Rank #6. Ipadora Queen. Rules the underwater kingdom with zero recorded criminal violations in her Sanctuary. The continent's finest diplomat. The Deep Mother's living representative.

View Profile
Character Rank #5

Selvarin

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #5. Master of Swords. Oredsy's sword-philosophy leader. Carries Vaelrin's Edge. Has never lost a recorded duel. His doors are unlocked.

View Profile
Character Rank #5

Sunlee

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #5. Master of Martial Arts. Ruler of Akison's Iron Path government. The Black Root Staff grows stronger every time it is struck. Has never lost a fight recorded in Akison's history.

View Profile
Character Rank #7

Vaelith the Hollow

Darkmane Elf

Power Rank #7. Darkmane Elf. De facto ruler of Grousea. Criminal network operator. The most dangerous Darkmane in Criozevan. Her Hollow Void ability has no known counter.

View Profile
Character Rank #7

Varnokh

Golem

Power Rank #7. The Golem master-crafter. Keeper of Karthrun inscription knowledge. Lives in Cridbury mining town. Every functional Golem in Criozevan has runes that trace their lineage to Varnokh's workshop.

View Profile
Character Rank #5

Veles

Folkwynd (Human)

Power Rank #5. Master of Magic. Governs from Iyhago Prime in the Sanctum Spiral. Speaks only K≈çtoba by preference. The largest accumulated spell knowledge of any living practitioner.

View Profile
Character Rank #8

Vorryn

Tharnex

Power Rank #8. The last living Tharnex. His race was destroyed in the War of Fodon. Being the sole survivor of an extinct race has given him enhanced abilities that defy standard power classification.

View Profile
Character Rank #1

Vorvax

Unknown (Divine-class Entity)

Power Rank #1. Divine-class entity. Responsible for the War of Fodon ‚Äî its influence drove X'zel from Criozevan and destroyed the Tharnex. Currently unlocated. Only Fluffy is ranked above it.

View Profile
Character Rank #7

Vulkran

Unknown (Dragon-class Entity)

Power Rank #7. Ancient dragon entity. Dormant in the canyon beneath Plodrough. His body heat keeps the entire canyon town warm. Has not been fully active since the First Great War.

View Profile
Character Rank #6

Zunarorth

Golem

Power Rank #6. One of the oldest Golems in Criozevan. Golem King's most trusted lieutenant. Operates in the Suudon swamp. The only Golem capable of rewriting another Golem's rune-mind.
